title: What keyboard synthesizer has all sounds from Moog, ARP, CS-80, Prophet-5, OBX-a and Jupiter-6? - Quora

response.answer_text: What keyboard synthesizer has all sounds from Moog, ARP, CS-80, Prophet-5, OBX-a and Jupiter-6? This is a fun question, as these synths are analog classics. As an owner of classic Moog, Oberheim, and Roland synths, I can assure you that no single hardware synthesizer will effectively emulate the exact sounds of all these synths. You can get close with some various hardware synths, but if you’re looking for one great, affordable solution that gets you the sound of these synths, I highly recommend Arturia’s V-Collection. V-Collection is a package of softsynth emulations of all the classics, that run on your Mac or PC (VST or AU). While V-collection isn’t a “true analog” hardware synth, or any type of “keyboard synthesizer”, the software emulation sounds incredibly good. https://www.arturia.com/products/analog-classics/v-collection/overview#en

The UVI software package Synth Legacy has sounds from all of these synths, and many more! However, it is sample-based, so it is not nearly as customizable as any one of those synthesizers on their own. Really depends what you’re looking for.
